bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures Amendment 1: Increase of Voltages to 1000 V AC and Below
IEEE Draft Standard for Low-Voltage AC Power Circuit Breakers Used in Enclosures Amendment 1: Increase of Voltages to 1000 V AC and Below

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment addresses the addition of the maximum voltages of 1058 V, 730 V and nominal voltages of 1000 V, 690 V respectively. Updates are made with respect to the dielectric test voltages.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
